Title: Being True
Plot:
Just when Eve thinks things are starting to workout for her and Sam, Imogin returns from Japan and wants to pick up with Sam where they left off by having him take her to the school ball.  Eve is saddened by this and decides not to attend the dance by herself, but her dad talks her into going.
Meanwhile, Imogin is having an awful time at the dance and wants to leave just as Eve arrives.  Sam tells Imogin to get lost and askes Eve to dance.  She says no and is about to leave, as Sam announces to
